mapper.select: select voc_seq, owner_seq, content, in_date, in_user_id, up_date, up_user_id from voice_of_customer where owner_seq = :v_owner_seq order by voc_seq
mapper.update: insert into voice_of_customer ( voc_seq, owner_seq, content, in_date, in_user_id, up_date, up_user_id ) values ( voc_seq.nextval, :1, :2, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), :3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), :4 )
